title: Trade?  My T205 Home Run Baker (PSA 2.5) for your HOF card (my need)
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Trade?  My T205 Home Run Baker (PSA 2.5) for your HOF card (my need)
posts.post_content:
** Update, Frank has a new home… sold to another great collector here! **

Instead of selling this nice T205 HR Baker card (great front, decently centered and nice borders - some staining on the back), I wonder if I can trade for HOF player/cards that I need.

My current needs are broad and include Greenberg, 3-finger Brown and others... can make up diff, if any, in cash.

Let me know if you'd like to explore - thanks!

Jeff
